pages.text: Allows you to teleport directly to where ever you're looking.Teleport by setting a custom keybinding (default R). When shift is held and the keybind is pressed you will teleport to your respawn point. To link simply shift rick click on any $(l:io/battery)Power$(/l) Block.
Requires getting a $(l:modules/module)Module$(/l) first along with a dragon egg...
